values: Repentance, Forgiveness, and the Gift of the SpiritRepentance, Forgiveness, and the Gift of the Spirit

Even if you are a murderer
      of the Son of God, God himself is ready to forgive you!
      And not only to forgive you but to give you his Spirit!
